desc: Arun Ray, a renowned Indian chef, expertly crafts flavorful biryanis and tantalizing fish curries along with a range of traditional dishes. His culinary prowess brings to life the vibrant and authentic flavors of India, delighting palates and transporting diners to a world of gastronomic bliss.

recipe_info.cooking_method: To cook biryani, layer fragrant basmati rice with marinated meat or vegetables, aromatic spices, and saffron-infused water then steam until perfectly cooked and flavors meld together.
